task: Add Husky and lint-staged with format + lint on pre-commit
instructions: Read the configuration file .codex.json in the project root and follow its rules.
Create new branch codex/add-husky-lint-staged from origin/main branch.
Install husky and lint-staged as development dependencies.
Initialize husky in the repository and enable Git hooks.
Configure a pre-commit hook that runs lint-staged.
Configure lint-staged to run `npm run format` and `npm run lint` on staged files.
Verify the configuration by simulating a commit with staged files.
Execute npm run format to format the code.
Execute npm run lint to lint the code.
